org.rapla.plugin.mail

Class MailPlugin

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.rapla.plugin.mail.MailPlugin
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PluginDescriptor<ClientServiceContainer>

    public class MailPlugin
extends Object
implements PluginDescriptor<ClientServiceContainer>
    Provides the MailToUserInterface and the MailInterface for sending mails. The MailInterface can only be used on a machine that can connect to the mailserver. While the MailToUserInterface can be called from a client, it redirects the mail request to the server, which must be able to connect to the mailserver. Example 1: MailToUserInterface mail = getContext().loopup( MailToUserInterface.class ); mail.sendMail( subject, body );
    See Also:
    MailToUserInterface
